availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, flour dealer, forwarding and commission merchant. Signed a petition in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector. Owner: Gershom McCullum.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 99.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 148.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), 158.
KYR-0001-017-0163.
